title: Drawing, "studies of costumed male figures", ca. 1890
medium: black, sanguine crayons, white chalk, on salmon-pink paper
provenance: Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters
creditline: Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters
description: Horizontal rectangle. Left: study of hands; right: half-length study of figure seen from the back, the head facing right in profile.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "studies of costumed male figures", ca. 1890.
ca. 1890. black, sanguine crayons, white chalk, on salmon-pink paper. Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters. 1955-38-39.
